scripts.migrate: npx prisma format && npx prisma migrate dev && npx prisma generate
scripts.test: npm run test:1:cache && npm run test:run
scripts.test:full: npm run test:1 && npm run test:2 && npm run test:run
scripts.test:run: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm server yarn jest -i
scripts.test:2: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm server npx prisma migrate reset --force test && npx prisma migrate dev --name test --force
scripts.test:migrate:dockerless: npx prisma migrate reset --force test && npx migrate dev --name test --force
